page.title: 32Computer Games
page.content:
Computer games have really moved on in the last 20 years, sometime you can't even tell it's a game it looks like a movie.
The top ten games of 2011 are Gears of war 3, L.a noire, Mass effect 3, Portal 2, Project Draco, batman arkham city, bulletstom, child of Eden, human revolution, and elder scroll v skyrim.
The most popular games are black ops, Modern warfare 2, and halo reach and many more great games are to come in the next year to come.
By Connor
Class 6
